g4p_controls

Class GWindow.GWindowAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.event.WindowAdapter
      • g4p_controls.GWindow.GWindowAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WindowFocusListener, WindowListener, WindowStateListener, EventListener
    Enclosing class:
    GWindow

    public class GWindow.GWindowAdapter
extends WindowAdapter
    Window adapter class that remembers the window it belongs to so it can be used to mark it for closure if required.
    Author:
    Peter Lager
